ygData.subject: Hey John!
ygData.msgSnippet: Good to have you back on the list man. I was getting a little worried when you stopped replying for about two weeks :) I finally picked up a tomahawk after two
ygData.messageBody:
Good to have you back on the list man. I was getting a little worried when
you stopped replying for about two weeks :)

I finally picked up a tomahawk after two weeks of battling the campers and
farmers for the spawn. Shortly after, i went to najena with a strong group
of friends and we get me a barbed whip for the other hand. I'm a sweet
fighter now ;)

Hope to see you in game this evening to outfit myself so i look like a
mean machine.

Nick
